trans-unit.source: (altough it is not necessary), and allows to provide some options (separated by comma):
trans-unit.target: (altough it is not necessary), and allows to provide some options (separated by comma):

trans-unit.source: - CLI: --config flag to print the full configuration in stdout
trans-unit.target: - CLI: --config flag to print the full configuration in stdout

trans-unit.source: - CLINGO_OPTIONS can be a dict, mapping motif name to arbitrary parameters
trans-unit.target: - CLINGO_OPTIONS can be a dict, mapping motif name to arbitrary parameters

trans-unit.source: - StarSearch is dedicated to find stars, simplifying BicliqueSearch's job (enabled by default, user may use Biclique instead of both Star and NonStarBiclique)
trans-unit.target: - StarSearch is dedicated to find stars, simplifying BicliqueSearch's job (enabled by default, user may use Biclique instead of both Star and NonStarBiclique)

trans-unit.source: - [motif type order](#motif-type-order) option, allowing user to tune the order in which motifs are searched.
trans-unit.target: - [motif type order](#motif-type-order) option, allowing user to tune the order in which motifs are searched.

trans-unit.source: - [parallel motif search](#parallel-motif-search) option, making motifs search in different threads, and the overhaul compression much slower.
trans-unit.target: - [parallel motif search](#parallel-motif-search) option, making motifs search in different threads, and the overhaul compression much slower.

trans-unit.source: - `breakable`: allows the program to compress the line with multiple motifs
trans-unit.target: - `breakable`: allows the program to compress the line with multiple motifs

trans-unit.source: - `last`: stop compression here (useful to avoid the compression process to take over)
trans-unit.target: - `last`: stop compression here (useful to avoid the compression process to take over)

trans-unit.source: - `optional`: if not found, ignore instead of stopping
trans-unit.target: - `optional`: if not found, ignore instead of stopping

trans-unit.source: - `primer`: allows the program to extend the given motif if possible
trans-unit.target: - `primer`: allows the program to extend the given motif if possible

trans-unit.source: - add a list of available options in the README
trans-unit.target: - add a list of available options in the README

trans-unit.source: - arbitrary options for clingo using CLINGO_OPTIONS config field
trans-unit.target: - arbitrary options for clingo using CLINGO_OPTIONS config field

trans-unit.source: - bugfix about edges yielded by ASP and multithreading parameter
trans-unit.target: - bugfix about edges yielded by ASP and multithreading parameter

trans-unit.source: - bugfix on string options given in ini file, when unecessary quotes are kept
trans-unit.target: - bugfix on string options given in ini file, when unecessary quotes are kept

trans-unit.source: - bugfix: lowerbound can't go under 2 (3 for cliques)
trans-unit.target: - bugfix: lowerbound can't go under 2 (3 for cliques)

trans-unit.source: - clique search: lowerbound is initially computed as the maximal degree of node of clustering coefficient equals to 1
trans-unit.target: - clique search: lowerbound is initially computed as the maximal degree of node of clustering coefficient equals to 1

trans-unit.source: - config allow optimization target between memory or CPU (currently define a constraint implementation in ASP)
trans-unit.target: - config allow optimization target between memory or CPU (currently define a constraint implementation in ASP)

trans-unit.source: - config allow user to define the number of CPU for clingo to use
trans-unit.target: - config allow user to define the number of CPU for clingo to use

trans-unit.source: - config may now be given in INI format
trans-unit.target: - config may now be given in INI format

trans-unit.source: - configuration allow for improved lowerbound computation of bicliques
trans-unit.target: - configuration allow for improved lowerbound computation of bicliques

trans-unit.source: - do not filter out nodes alone in their connected component (cf [keep-single-nodes option](#keep-single-nodes))
trans-unit.target: - do not filter out nodes alone in their connected component (cf [keep-single-nodes option](#keep-single-nodes))

trans-unit.source: - enable multishot motif search by default
trans-unit.target: - enable multishot motif search by default

trans-unit.source: - generated bubble allow client to give heading comments
trans-unit.target: - generated bubble allow client to give heading comments

trans-unit.source: - graph filtering: optimization leading to general performance gain when enabled
trans-unit.target: - graph filtering: optimization leading to general performance gain when enabled

trans-unit.source: - handle keyboard interruption during search with grace
trans-unit.target: - handle keyboard interruption during search with grace

trans-unit.source: - handling spaces instead of _ in fields names for INI format
trans-unit.target: - handling spaces instead of _ in fields names for INI format

trans-unit.source: - improve handling of statistic files, that now contains cc idx and motif bounds
trans-unit.target: - improve handling of statistic files, that now contains cc idx and motif bounds

trans-unit.source: - no statistics file to write by default
trans-unit.target: - no statistics file to write by default

trans-unit.source: - option [bubble embeds cc](#bubble-embeds-cc), to put each cc in a dedicated powernode
trans-unit.target: - option [bubble embeds cc](#bubble-embeds-cc), to put each cc in a dedicated powernode

trans-unit.source: - option [bubble with simple edges](#bubble-with-simple-edges), to keep or discard the simple edges from output
trans-unit.target: - option [bubble with simple edges](#bubble-with-simple-edges), to keep or discard the simple edges from output

trans-unit.source: - option [bubble with statistics](#bubble-with-statistics), to include stats and metrics in output bubble file
trans-unit.target: - option [bubble with statistics](#bubble-with-statistics), to include stats and metrics in output bubble file

trans-unit.source: - option [cc statistic file](#cc-statistic-file), to retrieve stats and metrics for connected components.
trans-unit.target: - option [cc statistic file](#cc-statistic-file), to retrieve stats and metrics for connected components.

trans-unit.source: - option [global statistics](#global-statistics), to compute statistics/metrics over all connected components.
trans-unit.target: - option [global statistics](#global-statistics), to compute statistics/metrics over all connected components.

trans-unit.source: - option [parallel cc compression](#parallel-cc-compression) to enable parallel compression of connected components
trans-unit.target: - option [parallel cc compression](#parallel-cc-compression) to enable parallel compression of connected components

trans-unit.source: - perf gain: the first motif to reach the best score is compressed, instead of the last
trans-unit.target: - perf gain: the first motif to reach the best score is compressed, instead of the last

trans-unit.source: - raise error when an invalid key is found in config file
trans-unit.target: - raise error when an invalid key is found in config file

trans-unit.source: - replace ASP code constraint to achieve much more efficient grounding
trans-unit.target: - replace ASP code constraint to achieve much more efficient grounding

trans-unit.source: - simplify ASP code by removing useless arg in block/4 atoms
trans-unit.target: - simplify ASP code by removing useless arg in block/4 atoms

trans-unit.source: - slight bounds improvements for non-star-biclique motif
trans-unit.target: - slight bounds improvements for non-star-biclique motif

trans-unit.source: - specify a prefix for all (power) nodes with OUTPUT_NODE_PREFIX config field
trans-unit.target: - specify a prefix for all (power) nodes with OUTPUT_NODE_PREFIX config field

trans-unit.source: - statistics on time and compression metrics are computed by cc and for all graph. See new options.
trans-unit.target: - statistics on time and compression metrics are computed by cc and for all graph. See new options.

trans-unit.source: - statistics/timers now provides time needed to search for each motif
trans-unit.target: - statistics/timers now provides time needed to search for each motif

trans-unit.source: - support for [recipes](#recipes), that small file that allows to define the compressions to do
trans-unit.target: - support for [recipes](#recipes), that small file that allows to define the compressions to do

trans-unit.source: - time needed to compress the connected component (if TIMERS is enabled)
trans-unit.target: - time needed to compress the connected component (if TIMERS is enabled)

trans-unit.source: - use new versions of clyngor and bubbletools
trans-unit.target: - use new versions of clyngor and bubbletools

trans-unit.source: A file in which some statistics will be written in CSV format, giving among others size of compressed motifs, and their compression times (if *timers* option is enabled).
trans-unit.target: A file in which some statistics will be written in CSV format, giving among others size of compressed motifs, and their compression times (if *timers* option is enabled).

trans-unit.source: A recipe is a description of the motifs to compress.
trans-unit.target: A recipe is a description of the motifs to compress.

trans-unit.source: Accelerate the solving for graph with lots of equivalent motifs. It is generally a good option to enable.
trans-unit.target: Accelerate the solving for graph with lots of equivalent motifs. It is generally a good option to enable.

trans-unit.source: All values example are given for INI format.
trans-unit.target: All values example are given for INI format.

trans-unit.source: Another way to go is to convert the bubble to other formats handling hierarchical graphs, like [gexf](https://gephi.org/gexf/format/),
trans-unit.target: Another way to go is to convert the bubble to other formats handling hierarchical graphs, like [gexf](https://gephi.org/gexf/format/),

trans-unit.source: Arbitrary parameters to give to clingo (note that some, like multithreading or optmode, may already be set by other options).
trans-unit.target: Arbitrary parameters to give to clingo (note that some, like multithreading or optmode, may already be set by other options).

trans-unit.source: As a consequence, you have to [install Cytoscape 2](http://chianti.ucsd.edu/Cyto-2%5F8%5F3/), and put the `CyOog.jar` file into `path/to/cytoscape/install/dir/plugins/`.
trans-unit.target: As a consequence, you have to [install Cytoscape 2](http://chianti.ucsd.edu/Cyto-2%5F8%5F3/), and put the `CyOog.jar` file into `path/to/cytoscape/install/dir/plugins/`.

trans-unit.target: If a node is found to be alone in its connected component, it will be kept nonetheless.

trans-unit.target: If disabled, will discard simple (i.e. non-power) edges of output.

trans-unit.target: Once all lines have been applied, the normal compression compression takes over

trans-unit.source: Optimization on biclique lowerbound computation. Can be costly. Deactivate with 2. With value at n, up to n neighbors are considered.
trans-unit.target: Optimization on biclique lowerbound computation. Can be costly. Deactivate with 2. With value at n, up to n neighbors are considered.

trans-unit.source: Prefix to add to all (power)nodes names in output.
trans-unit.target: Prefix to add to all (power)nodes names in output.

trans-unit.source: Print in stdout the main steps of compression.
trans-unit.target: Print in stdout the main steps of compression.

trans-unit.source: Print in stdout the motif transformation.
trans-unit.target: Print in stdout the motif transformation.

trans-unit.source: Recover covered edges from ASP. If falsy, will ask motif searcher to compute the edges, which may be quicker.
trans-unit.target: Recover covered edges from ASP. If falsy, will ask motif searcher to compute the edges, which may be quicker.

trans-unit.source: The bubble file is the main output of PowerGrASP, and describes a power graph.
trans-unit.target: The bubble file is the main output of PowerGrASP, and describes a power graph.

trans-unit.source: The bubble is a format handled by the [CyOog plugin](http://www.biotec.tu-dresden.de/research/schroeder/powergraphs/download-cytoscape-plugin.html) for [Cytoscape 2](http://cytoscape.org/), allowing one to load a bubble formatted file and to visualize the corresponding graph.
trans-unit.target: The bubble is a format handled by the [CyOog plugin](http://www.biotec.tu-dresden.de/research/schroeder/powergraphs/download-cytoscape-plugin.html) for [Cytoscape 2](http://cytoscape.org/), allowing one to load a bubble formatted file and to visualize the corresponding graph.

trans-unit.source: The config file may be either in ini or json format, as shown in [`test/powergrasp.oneshot.cfg`](test/powergrasp.oneshot.cfg) and [`test/powergrasp.manyoptions.cfg`](test/powergrasp.manyoptions.cfg).
trans-unit.target: The config file may be either in ini or json format, as shown in [`test/powergrasp.oneshot.cfg`](test/powergrasp.oneshot.cfg) and [`test/powergrasp.manyoptions.cfg`](test/powergrasp.manyoptions.cfg).

trans-unit.source: The configuration may be printed in stdout using:
trans-unit.target: The configuration may be printed in stdout using:

trans-unit.source: The first column usually contains the motif types separated by comma
trans-unit.target: The first column usually contains the motif types separated by comma

trans-unit.source: The order of second and third columns does not have any influence.
trans-unit.target: The order of second and third columns does not have any influence.

trans-unit.source: The recipe file will be read line by line.
trans-unit.target: The recipe file will be read line by line.

trans-unit.source: This is a task implemented by [bubbletools](https://github.com/Aluriak/bubble-tools/).
trans-unit.target: This is a task implemented by [bubbletools](https://github.com/Aluriak/bubble-tools/).

trans-unit.source: To use to compress connected components in different processes.
trans-unit.target: To use to compress connected components in different processes.

trans-unit.source: Two different motifs for stars and bicliques, so the search space for bicliques is smaller. Yields good performance improvements on big graphs.
trans-unit.target: Two different motifs for stars and bicliques, so the search space for bicliques is smaller. Yields good performance improvements on big graphs.

trans-unit.source: Use as many thread there are available CPU:
trans-unit.target: Use as many thread there are available CPU:

trans-unit.source: Use multithreading to search for all motifs in the same time, instead of sequentially.
trans-unit.target: Use multithreading to search for all motifs in the same time, instead of sequentially.

trans-unit.source: Using the `--recipe` option in CLI, user can provide a recipe for its own graph,
trans-unit.target: Using the `--recipe` option in CLI, user can provide a recipe for its own graph,

trans-unit.source: When enabled, output bubble will contain statistics about each connected component
trans-unit.target: When enabled, output bubble will contain statistics about each connected component

trans-unit.source: When enabled, statistics and metrics computation on the overall graph will be performed at the end of compression.
trans-unit.target: When enabled, statistics and metrics computation on the overall graph will be performed at the end of compression.

trans-unit.source: When possible, delete the quotes around identifiers in the bubble. May lead to node name collision.
trans-unit.target: When possible, delete the quotes around identifiers in the bubble. May lead to node name collision.

trans-unit.source: When possible, prefer memory over CPU.
trans-unit.target: When possible, prefer memory over CPU.

trans-unit.source: You must have [`clingo`](https://potassco.org/doc/start/) in your path. Depending on your OS, it might be done with a system installation,
trans-unit.target: You must have [`clingo`](https://potassco.org/doc/start/) in your path. Depending on your OS, it might be done with a system installation,

trans-unit.source: allowing to specify prior motifs to search.
trans-unit.target: allowing to specify prior motifs to search.

trans-unit.source: and check that you are using python 3.
trans-unit.target: and check that you are using python 3.

trans-unit.source: and the overall graph (if global_statistics is enabled).
trans-unit.target: and the overall graph (if global_statistics is enabled).

trans-unit.source: and to tune the core compression and related optimizations.
trans-unit.target: and to tune the core compression and related optimizations.

trans-unit.source: or through [downloading](https://github.com/potassco/clingo/releases) and (compilation and) manual installation.
trans-unit.target: or through [downloading](https://github.com/potassco/clingo/releases) and (compilation and) manual installation.

trans-unit.source: taking advantage of ASP and Python lifting and simplifications.
trans-unit.target: taking advantage of ASP and Python lifting and simplifications.

trans-unit.source: that can be overwritten by a `powergrasp.cfg` file placed in the working directory.
trans-unit.target: that can be overwritten by a `powergrasp.cfg` file placed in the working directory.
